name: Craigslistresponder
tag_list: craigslist-ad-responder, cl-auto-responder, cl-responder, auto-ad-responder, craigslist-ad-poster, email-extractor-tool, craigslist-marketing-secrets, cl-postings, craigslist-marketing-tool, craigslist-marketing, craigslist-scraper, auto-ad-response, crai
overview:
Craigslist ad responder tool automatically responds to ads in job, dating, for sale, real estate and other categories on craigslist by email.

Craigslist Responder is an auto responder tool that sends responses to all the people posting ads on Craigslist. You can generate double leads with Craigslist Responder.

Craigslist Email Extractor is web based email extractor tool tool that extracts the email addresses of the ad posters on Craigslist. People use this as lead generation software which provides highly targeted traffic to their website.Craigstlist Email extractor tool reduces the time and efforts that you put into search Craigslist postings manually that match your criteria. It is a simple and cost-effective way to search classified postings and responding them automatically.
